summary: The conversation is between a customer service representative from LendingClub, a peer-to-peer lending platform, and a customer named Surender Kumar. The representative is trying to help the customer resolve an issue with accessing his investment statement on the platform.
customer_concerns: - The customer is unable to view the correct investment statement on the platform.
questions_asked: - The customer asks if he needs to go to "more detail" to access his account details.
overall_sentiment:
Neutral
The conversation starts with the customer expressing a concern, but the representative is able to provide a step-by-step guide to help the customer verify his email and access the investment statement. The overall tone is neutral and the issue is resolved.
